Fallen Dream Keys is a brazilian game of psychological horror that uses the backdrop of the town of Chaves. After a tantrum, Mr. Barriga kills all the locals and now it's up to you to investigate the causes of the event.

Nhonho is a sick child. His condition worsens and his father, Mr. Barriga, starts to charge higher rents of the villagers to pay for the child's treatment. However, they do not accept this increase and decide not to pay the amounts required ....

For lack of treatment, the poor boy has died. In an act completely insane, Mr. Barriga decides to kill all the inhabitants of the place, leaving a trail of destruction where old people live happy.

The village became a place dark and macabre because of all the deaths that happened and now it's up to you to conduct an investigation of everything that happened there. Search by various objects left by former residents and try to get away from the fury of the Stomach.

In the game, you can explore every corner of the site, including the Village 1, where is the house of your Madruga, Dona Florinda's, the Witch 71, the Village 2, where is the pit that Chiquinha used to steal coins, and to the Village 3, which is supposedly the home of the Keys.

In a totally dark environment and with the aid of a small flashlight with low battery, you should investigate the scene and find the information required. Sinister voices and sudden appearances of dead characters will try to keep his job.

Release Date: 2013
Genre: Adventure / Horror / Psychological Horror
Size: 121 MB

minimum System Requirements
not Specified
